1: -module(doc_html_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: %% callbacks
    4: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
    5: 
    6: %% test format
    7: -export([convert_erlang_html/1, convert_unknown_format/1]).
    8: 
    9: %% test non-existing moduledoc
   10: -export([non_existing_moduledoc/1,hidden_moduledoc/1,existing_moduledoc/1]).
   11: 
   12: %% test non-existing docs
   13: -export([non_existing_doc/1, hidden_doc/1, existing_doc/1]).
   14: 
   15: %% headings
   16: -export([h1_test/1, h2_test/1, h3_test/1, h4_test/1, h5_test/1, h6_test/1]).
   17: 
   18: %% quotes
   19: -export([single_line_quote_test/1, double_char_for_quote_test/1,
   20:          ignore_three_spaces_before_quote/1, multiple_line_quote_test/1,
   21:          paragraph_in_between_test/1]).
   22: 
   23: %% paragraph
   24: -export([paragraph_after_heading_test/1, quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% inline code
   27: -export([single_line_code_test/1, multiple_line_code_test/1, paragraph_between_code_test/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% fence code
   30: -export([single_line_fence_code_test/1, multiple_line_fence_code_test/1, paragraph_between_fence_code_test/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% br
   33: -export([start_with_br_test/1, multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test/1,
   34:          multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test/1, ending_br_test/1]).
   35: 
   36: %% Comments
   37: -export([begin_comment_test/1, after_paragraph_comment/1, forget_closing_comment/1 ]).
   38: 
   39: %% Format
   40: -export([format_heading_test/1, format_paragraph_test/1, format_multiple_inline/1,
   41:          format_multiple_inline_format_short/1, format_multiple_inline_format_long/1,
   42:          format_multiple_inline_format_mixed/1, unmatched_format_simple/1,
   43:          unmatched_format_with_inline/1, unmatched_complex_format_with_inline/1,
   44:          format_inline_link_with_inline/1, complex_inline_format/1, skip_symbols_in_inline/1]).
   45: 
   46: %% Bullet lists
   47: -export([singleton_bullet_list/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_with_format/1,
   48:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1,
   49:          multiline_bullet_indented_list/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list2/1,
   50:          multiline_bullet_list/1, even_nested_bullet_list/1, odd_nested_bullet_list/1,
   51:          complex_nested_bullet_list/1, complex_nested_bullet_list2/1]).
   52: 
   53: %% Numbered lists
   54: -export([singleton_numbered_list/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph/1,
   55:          singleton_numbered_list_with_format/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1,
   56:          singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1, multiline_numbered_indented_list/1,
   57:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2/1, multiline_numbered_list/1, even_nested_numbered_list/1,
   58:       odd_nested_numbered_list/1]).
   59: 
   60: -define(ERLANG_HTML, <<"application/erlang+html">>).
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   64: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   65: 
   66: 
   67: -define(EXPECTED_FUN(Expected), {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Expected, #{}}).
   68: 
   69: all() ->
   70:     [{group, different_format_generator},
   71:      {group, module_generator},
   72:      {group, doc_generator},
   73:      {group, header_generator},
   74:      {group, quote_generator},
   75:      {group, paragraph_generator},
   76:      {group, code_generator},
   77:      {group, fence_code_generator},
   78:      {group, br_generator},
   79:      {group, comment_generator},
   80:      {group, format_generator},
   81:      {group, bullet_list_generator},
   82:      {group, numbered_list_generator}
   83:     ].
   84: 
   85: groups() ->
   86:     [{different_format_generator, [parallel], different_format_conversion_tests()},
   87:      {module_generator, [sequence], moduledoc_tests()},
   88:      {doc_generator, [parallel], doc_tests()},
   89:      {header_generator, [parallel], header_tests()},
   90:      {quote_generator, [parallel], quote_tests()},
   91:      {paragraph_generator, [parallel], paragraph_tests()},
   92:      {code_generator, [parallel], code_tests()},
   93:      {fence_code_generator, [parallel], fence_code_tests()},
   94:      {br_generator, [parallel], br_tests()},
   95:      {comment_generator, [parallel], comment_tests()},
   96:      {format_generator, [parallel], format_tests()},
   97:      {bullet_list_generator, [parallel], bullet_list_tests()},
   98:      {numbered_list_generator, [parallel], numbered_list_tests()}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: different_format_conversion_tests() ->
  108:     [ convert_erlang_html,
  109:       convert_unknown_format
  110:     ].
  111: 
  112: moduledoc_tests() ->
  113:     [ non_existing_moduledoc,
  114:       hidden_moduledoc,
  115:       existing_moduledoc
  116:     ].
  117: 
  118: doc_tests() ->
  119:     [ non_existing_doc,
  120:       hidden_doc,
  121:       existing_doc
  122:     ].
  123: 
  124: header_tests() ->
  125:     [ h1_test,
  126:       h2_test,
  127:       h3_test,
  128:       h4_test,
  129:       h5_test,
  130:       h6_test
  131:     ].
  132: 
  133: quote_tests() ->
  134:     [ single_line_quote_test,
  135:       double_char_for_quote_test,
  136:       ignore_three_spaces_before_quote,
  137:       multiple_line_quote_test,
  138:       paragraph_in_between_test
  139:     ].
  140: 
  141: paragraph_tests() ->
  142:     [ paragraph_after_heading_test,
  143:       quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: code_tests() ->
  147:     [ single_line_code_test,
  148:       multiple_line_code_test,
  149:       paragraph_between_code_test
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: fence_code_tests() ->
  153:   [single_line_fence_code_test,
  154:    multiple_line_fence_code_test,
  155:    paragraph_between_fence_code_test
  156:   ].
  157: 
  158: br_tests() ->
  159:     [ start_with_br_test,
  160:       multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test,
  161:       multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test,
  162:       ending_br_test
  163:     ].
  164: 
  165: comment_tests() ->
  166:     [ begin_comment_test,
  167:       after_paragraph_comment,
  168:       forget_closing_comment
  169:     ].
  170: 
  171: format_tests() ->
  172:     [ format_heading_test,
  173:       format_paragraph_test,
  174:       format_multiple_inline,
  175:       format_multiple_inline_format_long,
  176:       format_multiple_inline_format_short,
  177:       format_multiple_inline_format_mixed,
  178:       unmatched_format_simple,
  179:       unmatched_format_with_inline,
  180:       unmatched_complex_format_with_inline,
  181:       format_inline_link_with_inline,
  182:       complex_inline_format,
  183:       skip_symbols_in_inline
  184:     ].
  185: 
  186: bullet_list_tests() ->
  187:     [ singleton_bullet_list,
  188:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  189:       singleton_bullet_list_with_format,
  190:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  191:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  192:       multiline_bullet_indented_list,
  193:       multiline_bullet_indented_list2,
  194:       multiline_bullet_list,
  195:       even_nested_bullet_list,
  196:       odd_nested_bullet_list,
  197:       complex_nested_bullet_list,
  198:       complex_nested_bullet_list2
  199:     ].
  200: 
  201: numbered_list_tests() ->
  202:     [ singleton_numbered_list,
  203:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  204:       singleton_numbered_list_with_format,
  205:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  206:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  207:       multiline_numbered_indented_list,
  208:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2,
  209:       multiline_numbered_list,
  210:       even_nested_numbered_list,
  211:       odd_nested_numbered_list
  212:     ].
  213: 
  214: convert_erlang_html(_Conf) ->
  215:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => [{p, [], [<<"Test">>]}]},
  216:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}}],
  217: 
  218:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ?ERLANG_HTML, none, #{}, Functions),
  219:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  220:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  221:     ok.
  222: 
  223: convert_unknown_format(_Conf) ->
  224:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"<text>Here</text>">>},
  225:     Functions = create_fun(Doc),
  226: 
  227:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"xml">>, Doc, #{},Functions),
  228:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  229:     ok.
  230: 
  231: non_existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  232:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, []),
  233:     _ = compile(Docs),
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: hidden_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  237:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, hidden, #{}, []),
  238:     _ = compile(Docs),
  239:     ok.
  240: 
  241: existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  242:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  243:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  244:     #{<<"en">> := HtmlModDoc} = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  245:     H1 = header(1, <<"Here">>),
  246:     [H1] = HtmlModDoc,
  247:     ok.
  248: 
  249: non_existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  250:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(none)),
  251:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  252:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: hidden_doc(_Conf) ->
  256:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(hidden)),
  257:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  258:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  259:     ok.
  260: 
  261: existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  262:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{},
  263:                         create_fun(#{<<"en">> => <<"Test">>})),
  264:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  265:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: h1_test(_Conf) ->
  269:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  270:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  271: 
  272:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [header(1, <<"Here">>)]},
  273:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  274:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  275:     ok.
  276: 
  277: h2_test(_Conf) ->
  278:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n## Header 2">>),
  279:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  280: 
  281:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h2, [], [<<"Header 2">>]}]},
  282:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  283:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: h3_test(_Conf) ->
  287:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n### Header 3">>),
  288:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  289: 
  290:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h3, [], [<<"Header 3">>]}]},
  291:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  292:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: h4_test(_Conf) ->
  296:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"### Here\n#### Header 4">>),
  297:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  298: 
  299:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h3, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]}]},
  300:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  301:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  302:     ok.
  303: 
  304: h5_test(_Conf) ->
  305:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  306:     DocH5 = #{<<"en">> => <<"##### H5">>},
  307:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  308:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH5, #{}}],
  309:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  310: 
  311:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  312:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  313:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  314:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  315:     ExpectedH5 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]} ]},
  316:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  317:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  318:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  319:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH5, #{}} = E2,
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: h6_test(_Conf) ->
  323:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  324:     DocH6 = #{<<"en">> => <<"###### H6\n## H2">>},
  325:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  326:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH6, #{}}],
  327:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  328: 
  329:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  330:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  331:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  332:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  333:     ExpectedH6 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h6, [], [<<"H6">>]},
  334:                                  {h2, [], [<<"H2">>]} ]},
  335:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  336:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  337:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  338:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH6, #{}} = E2,
  339:     ok.
  340: 
  341: 
  342: single_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  343:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  344:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  345: 
  346:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  347:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  348:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  349:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  350:     ok.
  351: 
  352: double_char_for_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  353:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n>> This is a quote">>),
  354:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  355: 
  356:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  357:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  358:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  359:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  360:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  361:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: ignore_three_spaces_before_quote(_Conf) ->
  365:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"   > # Here">>),
  366:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  367: 
  368:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here">>)),
  369:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  370:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: multiple_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  374:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> # Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  375:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  376: 
  377:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here\nThis is a quote">>)),
  378:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  379:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: paragraph_in_between_test(_Conf) ->
  383:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n> A quote\n## Header 2\nBody content">>),
  384:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  385: 
  386:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  387:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  388:                           quote(<<"A quote">>),
  389:                           header(2, <<"Header 2">>),
  390:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  391:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  392:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  393:     ok.
  394: 
  395: paragraph_after_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  396:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n\nBody content">>),
  397:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  398: 
  399:     Expected = #{<<"en">> =>
  400:                      [ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  401:                        p(<<"This is text">>),
  402:                        br(),
  403:                        p(<<"Body content">>)]},
  404:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  405:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  406:     ok.
  407: 
  408: quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  409:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> Quote 1\nThis is text\n> Quote 2\nBody content">>),
  410:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  411: 
  412:     Expected = expected([ quote(<<"Quote 1">>),
  413:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  414:                           quote(<<"Quote 2">>),
  415:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  416:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  417:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  418:     ok.
  419: 
  420: single_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  421:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n    This is code">>),
  422:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  423: 
  424:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  425:                           code(<<"This is code">>)]),
  426:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  427:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  428:     ok.
  429: 
  430: multiple_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  431:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"    # Here\n    This is code\n        Nested Line">>),
  432:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  433: 
  434:     Expected = expected(code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>)),
  435:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  436:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  437:     ok.
  438: 
  439: paragraph_between_code_test(_Conf) ->
  440:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a paragraph\n",
  441:                               "\n",
  442:                               "    # Here\n",
  443:                               "    This is code\n",
  444:                               "        Nested Line\n",
  445:                               "Another paragraph">>),
  446:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  447: 
  448:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"This is a paragraph">>),
  449:                           br(),
  450:                           code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>),
  451:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  452:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  453:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  454:     ok.
  455: 
  456: single_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  457:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  458: ```erlang
  459: test() -> ok.
  460: ```">>),
  461:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  462:     Expected = expected([ br(), code(<<"test() -> ok.">>)]),
  463:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  464:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  465:     ok.
  466: 
  467: multiple_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  468:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  469: ```erlang
  470: test() ->
  471:   ok.
  472: ```">>),
  473:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  474:     Expected = expected([ br(), code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  475:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  476:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: 
  480: paragraph_between_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  481:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a test:
  482: ```erlang
  483: test() ->
  484:   ok.
  485: ```">>),
  486:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  487:     Expected = expected([p(<<"This is a test:">>),
  488:                          code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  489:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  490:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  491:     ok.
  492: 
  493: 
  494: start_with_br_test(_Conf) ->
  495:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  496:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  497:     Expected = expected([ br(),
  498:                           br(),
  499:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  500:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  501:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  505:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\nAnother paragraph\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  506:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  507:     Expected = expected([ br(),
  508:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>),
  509:                           br(),
  510:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  511:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  512:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  513:     ok.
  514: 
  515: multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  516:   Text = """
  517: Returns a new list `List3`, which is made from the elements of `List1` followed
  518: by the elements of `List2`.
  519: """,
  520:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(list_to_binary(Text)),
  521:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  522:     Expected = expected([p([<<"Returns a new list ">>,
  523:                             inline_code(<<"List3">>),
  524:                             <<", which is made from the elements of ">>,
  525:                             inline_code(<<"List1">>), <<" followed">>,
  526:                             <<"\nby the elements of ">>,
  527:                             inline_code(<<"List2">>), <<".">>])]),
  528:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  529:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  530:     ok.
  531: 
  532: ending_br_test(_Conf) ->
  533:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n">>),
  534:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  535:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>), br() ]),
  536:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  537:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: begin_comment_test(_Conf) ->
  541:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  542:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  543:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  544:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  545:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  546:     ok.
  547: 
  548: after_paragraph_comment(_Conf) ->
  549:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  550:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  551:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>), p(<<"Test">>)]),
  552:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  553:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  554:     ok.
  555: 
  556: forget_closing_comment(_Conf) ->
  557:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore Test">>),
  558:     {'EXIT', {missing_close_comment, _}} = catch compile(Docs),
  559:     ok.
  560: 
  561: format_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  562:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# **H1**\n## _H2_\n### `H3`">>),
  563:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  564:     Expected = expected([ header(1, em(<<"H1">>)),
  565:                           header(2, it(<<"H2">>)),
  566:                           header(3, inline_code(<<"H3">>))
  567:                         ]),
  568:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  569:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  570:     ok.
  571: 
  572: format_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  573:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1** *HH* _H2_ __H3__ `code`">>),
  574:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  575:     Expected = expected([ p([ em(<<"H1">>),
  576:                               <<" ">>,
  577:                               it(<<"HH">>),
  578:                               <<" ">>,
  579:                               it(<<"H2">>),
  580:                               <<" ">>,
  581:                               em(<<"H3">>),
  582:                               <<" ">>,
  583:                               inline_code(<<"code">>)
  584:                             ])
  585:                         ]),
  586:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  587:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  588:     ok.
  589: 
  590: format_multiple_inline(_Conf) ->
  591:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 *HH***">>),
  592:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  593:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  594:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  595:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: format_multiple_inline_format_long(_Conf) ->
  599:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 __HH__**">>),
  600:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  601:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, em(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  602:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  603:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  604:     ok.
  605: 
  606: format_multiple_inline_format_short(_Conf) ->
  607:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"_H1 *HH*_">>),
  608:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  609:     Expected = expected([ p([ it([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  610:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  611:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  612:     ok.
  613: 
  614: format_multiple_inline_format_mixed(_Conf) ->
  615:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**__ _there_">>),
  616:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  617:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>, em(<<"test2">>)]),
  618:                               <<" ">>,
  619:                               it(<<"there">>)])
  620:                         ]),
  621:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  622:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  623:     ok.
  624: 
  625: unmatched_format_simple(_Conf) ->
  626:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold*">>),
  627:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  628:     Expected = expected([ p([<<"**Bold*">> ])]),
  629:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  630:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  631: 
  632: unmatched_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  633:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold *Italics*">>),
  634:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  635:     Expected = expected(p([<<"**Bold ">>, it(<<"Italics">>) ])),
  636:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  637:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  638: 
  639: unmatched_complex_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  640:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**_ _there_">>),
  641:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  642:     Expected = expected([ p([ <<"__H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>,
  643:                               em(<<"test2">>),
  644:                               it(<<" ">>),
  645:                               <<"there_">>])
  646:                         ]),
  647:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  648:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  649:     ok.
  650: 
  651: format_inline_link_with_inline(_Config) ->
  652:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"[`splitwith/2`](`splitwith/2`) behaves as if">>),
  653:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  654:     Expected = expected([ p([inline_code(<<"splitwith/2">>),<<" (">>,inline_code(<<"splitwith/2">>), <<") behaves as if">>])]),
  655:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  656:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  657:     ok.
  658: 
  659: complex_inline_format(_Config) ->
  660:   %% The complexity here comes from the _, where the alg needs to backtrack
  661:   %% add the _ to an existing buffer, and continue where it left off using
  662:   %% any previous opening format characters, in this case **.
  663:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}`**">>),
  664:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  665:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}">>)))),
  666:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  667:   ok.
  668: 
  669: skip_symbols_in_inline(_Config) ->
  670:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{the_beginning, the_end}`**">>),
  671:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  672:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{the_beginning, the_end}">>)))),
  673:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  674:   ok.
  675: 
  676: 
  677: singleton_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  678:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner">>),
  679:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  680:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), br()]),
  681:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  682:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  683:     ok.
  684: 
  685: singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->
  686:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  687:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  688:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), br(), br(), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  689:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  690:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  691:     ok.
  692: 
  693: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  694:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  695:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  696:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p(<<"One liner">>), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)])]), br()]),
  697:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  698:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  699:     ok.
  700: 
  701: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  702:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  703:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  704:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p(<<"One liner">>), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)])]), br()]),
  705:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  706:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  707:     ok.
  708: 
  709: 
  710: singleton_bullet_list_with_format(_Config) ->
  711:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* *One* __liner__">>),
  712:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  713:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))]), br()]),
  714:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  715:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  716:     ok.
  717: 
  718: multiline_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  719:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n* Second line">>),
  720:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  721:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))]), br()]),
  722:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  723:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  724:     ok.
  725: 
  726: multiline_bullet_indented_list(_Config) ->
  727:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  728:              <<"  * One liner\n  * Second line">>),
  729:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  730:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))]), br()]),
  731:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  732:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  733:     ok.
  734: 
  735: multiline_bullet_indented_list2(_Config) ->
  736:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  737:              <<"  * _One liner_\n  * _Second_ `line`">>),
  738:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  739:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  740:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))]), br()]),
  741:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  742:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  743:     ok.
  744: 
  745: even_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  746:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n  * Second nested line">>),
  747:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  748:     Expected = expected([ul([
  749:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  750:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  751:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  752:                                      ])
  753:                                 ])
  754:                             ]),
  755:                          br()]),
  756:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  757:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  758:     ok.
  759: 
  760: odd_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  761:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n  * Second nested line\n  * Third nested line">>),
  762:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  763:     Expected = expected([ul([
  764:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  765:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  766:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  767:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  768:                                      ])
  769:                                 ])
  770:                             ]),
  771:                          br()]),
  772:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  773:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  774:     ok.
  775: 
  776: complex_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  777:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n* Second line">>),
  778:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  779:     Expected = expected([ul([
  780:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  781:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)) ])
  782:                                 ]),
  783:                              li([p(<<"Second line">>)])
  784:                             ]),
  785:                          br()]),
  786:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  787:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  788:     ok.
  789: 
  790: complex_nested_bullet_list2(_Config) ->
  791:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  792: * One liner
  793:   * First nested line
  794:     * Second level nested line
  795:   * Second nested line
  796:     * Another nested line
  797: * Second one liner">>),
  798:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  799:     Expected = expected([br(),
  800:                          ul([
  801:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  802:                                   ul([ li([
  803:                                            p(<<"First nested line">>),
  804:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Second level nested line">>)])])
  805:                                           ]),
  806:                                        li([
  807:                                            p(<<"Second nested line">>),
  808:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Another nested line">>)])])
  809:                                           ])
  810:                                      ])
  811:                                 ]),
  812:                              li([ p(<<"Second one liner">>)])
  813:                             ]),
  814:                          br()]),
  815:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  816:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  817:     ok.
  818: 
  819: singleton_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  820:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner">>),
  821:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  822:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), br()]),
  823:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  824:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: 
  828: singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->
  829:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  830:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  831:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), br(), br(), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  832:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  833:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  834:     ok.
  835: 
  836: singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  837:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  838:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  839:     Expected = expected([ol([li([p(<<"One liner">>), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)])]), br()]),
  840:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  841:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  842:     ok.
  843: 
  844: singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  845:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  846:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  847:     Expected = expected([ol([li([p(<<"One liner">>), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)])]), br()]),
  848:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  849:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  850:     ok.
  851: 
  852: 
  853: singleton_numbered_list_with_format(_Config) ->
  854:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. *One* __liner__">>),
  855:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  856:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))]), br()]),
  857:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  858:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  859:     ok.
  860: 
  861: multiline_numbered_indented_list(_Config) ->
  862:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"  1. One liner\n  2. Second line">>),
  863:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  864:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))]), br()]),
  865:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  866:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  867:     ok.
  868: 
  869: multiline_numbered_indented_list2(_Config) ->
  870:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  871:              <<"  1. _One liner_\n  2. _Second_ `line`">>),
  872:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  873:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  874:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))]), br()]),
  875:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  876:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  877:     ok.
  878: 
  879: multiline_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  880:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n2. Second line">>),
  881:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  882:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))]), br()]),
  883:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  884:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  885:     ok.
  886: 
  887: even_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  888:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line">>),
  889:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  890:     Expected = expected([ol([
  891:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  892:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  893:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  894:                                      ])
  895:                                 ])
  896:                             ]),
  897:                          br()]),
  898:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  899:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  900:     ok.
  901: 
  902: odd_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  903:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line\n  3. Third nested line">>),
  904:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  905:     Expected = expected([ol([
  906:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  907:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  908:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  909:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  910:                                      ])
  911:                                 ])
  912:                             ]),
  913:                          br()]),
  914:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  915:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  916:     ok.
  917: 
  918: 
  919: header(Level, Text) when is_integer(Level) ->
  920:     HeadingLevel = integer_to_list(Level),
  921:     HeadingLevelAtom = list_to_existing_atom("h" ++ HeadingLevel),
  922:     {HeadingLevelAtom, [], [Text]}.
  923: 
  924: quote(X) ->
  925:     {pre,[],[{code,[],[X]}]}.
  926: 
  927: code(X) ->
  928:     {pre,[],[inline_code(X)]}.
  929: 
  930: inline_code(X) ->
  931:     {code,[],[X]}.
  932: 
  933: p(X) when is_list(X) ->
  934:     {p, [], X};
  935: p(X) when is_tuple(X); is_binary(X) ->
  936:     p([X]).
  937: 
  938: em(X) when is_list(X) ->
  939:     {em, [], X};
  940: em(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  941:     em([X]).
  942: 
  943: it(X) when is_list(X) ->
  944:     {i, [], X};
  945: it(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  946:     it([X]).
  947: 
  948: br() ->
  949:     {br, [], []}.
  950: 
  951: ul(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  952:     {ul, [], Items}.
  953: 
  954: ol(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  955:     {ol, [], Items}.
  956: 
  957: li(Item) when is_tuple(Item); is_binary(Item) ->
  958:     li([Item]);
  959: li(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  960:     {li, [], Items}.
  961: 
  962: -spec create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) -> #docs_v1{} when
  963:       Language  :: atom(),
  964:       Mime      :: binary(),
  965:       ModuleDoc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  966:       Metadata  :: map(),
  967:       Docs      :: [{{Kind, Name, Arity},
  968:                      Anno :: erl_anno:anno(),
  969:                      Signature :: [binary()],
  970:                      Doc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  971:                      Metadata :: map()
  972:                     }],
  973:       Kind      :: function | type | callback,
  974:       Name      :: atom(),
  975:       Arity     :: non_neg_integer(),
  976:       DocLanguage :: binary(),
  977:       DocValue :: binary() | term().
  978: create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) ->
  979:     #docs_v1{anno = [],
  980:              beam_language = Language,
  981:              format = Mime,
  982:              module_doc = ModuleDoc,
  983:              metadata = maps:merge(#{ otp_doc_vsn => ?CURR_DOC_VERSION }, Metadata),
  984:              docs = Docs}.
  985: 
  986: extract_moduledoc(Docs) ->
  987:     Docs#docs_v1.module_doc.
  988: 
  989: extract_doc(Docs) ->
  990:     Docs#docs_v1.docs.
  991: 
  992: extract_format(Docs) ->
  993:     Docs#docs_v1.format.
  994: 
  995: create_eep48_doc(Doc) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  996:     create_eep48_doc(Doc, <<"text/markdown">>).
  997: 
  998: create_eep48_doc(Doc, Format) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  999:     Docs = #{<<"en">> => Doc},
 1000:     create_eep48(erlang, Format, Docs, #{}, create_fun(Docs)).
 1001: 
 1002: create_fun(Docs) ->
 1003:     [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Docs, #{}}].
 1004: 
 1005: 
 1006: expected(X) when is_list(X)->
 1007:     #{<<"en">> => X};
 1008: expected(X) when is_tuple(X) ->
 1009:     expected([X]).
 1010: 
 1011: compile(Docs) ->
 1012:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
 1013:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
 1014:     ?NATIVE_FORMAT = extract_format(HtmlDocs),
 1015:     HtmlDocs.
